title: Humanity - Complete Timeline
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Comprehensive timeline of human history from 100,000 years ago to modern era, covering religion, technology, civilization, and discovery

key_corrections.language_fire: NOT created by our species - language through gestures existed longer, fire control 1M+ years
key_corrections.neanderthal_dna: 1-4% in most humans, except Sub-Saharan Africans (100% Homo Sapien)
key_corrections.denisovan_dna: 4-6% only in Papua New Guinea natives

70000_bc.artifacts: Stone carved like python scales, 13,000 tools
70000_bc.significance: Proof of abstract thought 70,000 years ago

50000_bc.event: Symbolic thought and raw material selection spread
50000_bc.herbs: Silene Udulata (dream herb for Ubulawu mixture)

45000_bc.event: Southern Dispersal Route - Africa to Australia
45000_bc.route: Southern Africa → Ethiopia/Saudi Arabia → India → Indochina → Australia

30000_bc.location: Bhimbetka Rock Shelters, Madhya Pradesh, India

18000_45000_bc.significance: Oldest cremation example, Dreamtime religion origins

11000_bc.method: Human pollination instead of Fig wasps

events: Native Americans cross Siberia to Alaska
City of Dwarka built (India, now underwater)
10000_bc.scarab_note: Scarab beetles follow Moon/Stars, may have helped star mapping

3000_bc.significance: Became religious symbol (spokes, movement = celestial bodies)

calendar_creation.method: Walls as fake horizons, mark sun position daily = 365 marks
calendar_creation.days: Saturn-day, Sun-day, Moon-day from Ogdoad (7 heavenly bodies)

2600_bc.legacy: Temple became first Hospital, later worshiped as God

3300_1700_bc.significance: Precursor to Hinduism, first grid-shaped city

2000_bc.significance: Mediterranean mixing of Egyptian, Eurasian, European cultures

events: Vedas written in Sanskrit (Rig Veda first) → Hinduism
Phoenicia founded (Israel, Lebanon, Jordan, Palestine, Syria)

200_bc.key_figure: Hannibal Barca - taught Rome military tactics

medieval_to_modern.300_ad: Constantine - first Christian Roman Emperor ('In this sign you conquer')

events: Poor Knights of Christ → Knights Templar

1215_ad.significance: Juries, Rights, Parliaments - power from Kings to people

medieval_to_modern.1400_ad: Leonardo Da Vinci (Tank, Helicopter, Scuba blueprints)

scientific_revolution.1700_ad: Electronic devices begin, Galvani discovers bioelectricity
scientific_revolution.1837_ad: Stein Hill - Earth as circuit proposal

1886_1900_ad.connection: Friends with Swami Vivekananda (first Hindu Temples in US)

scientific_revolution.1920_ad: Marcus Garvey (Black Pride), Noble Drew Ali (Moorish Science Temple)
scientific_revolution.1939_1945_ad: WWII, only atomic bomb used in war
